item.title: FSCast #267. Title II readiness, CSUN plans, And focusing On What Really Matters
item.content:encoded: This month on FSCast: Elizabeth Whitaker previews Vispero’s plans for CSUN, as well as our upcoming training opportunities; David Sloan explores key implications of ADA Title II for digital accessibility; Olga Espinola helps us to focus on some of the things that matter the most. Activate to listen, right-click to download. You can also Read …

item.title: Learn Ten Tips for Accessing OneDrive Online with JAWS
item.content:encoded: Are you looking for ways to optimize your OneDrive online experience with JAWS? Do you need to learn how to locate, download, and access files quickly and efficiently? item.title: FSCast #266. On reading, mentorship and Braille Advocacy
item.content:encoded: This month on FSCast: Olga Espinola shares her life story, where learning and mentorship go hand in hand. Dave Williams discusses tactile Braille displays and explains some of the advantages of multiline Braille support in JAWS. Elizabeth Whitaker introduces upcoming training opportunities from Vispero. item.title: Join Us to Learn About Multiline Braille with the Dot Pad X and JAWS

item.title: Download the Latest Adobe Reader Update to Resolve an Issue Filling Out PDF Forms
item.content:encoded: A recent update to Adobe Reader introduced an issue that prevented users from filling out PDF forms with screen readers such as JAWS. When navigating a form, keyboard focus did not move from field to field, making it impossible to reach form controls or enter information. Adobe has resolved this issue in their latest update …
